name: transoceanic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
across an ocean or oceans: Transoceanic phone calls could soon become much cheaper. The ship was designed as a luxurious trans-oceanic passenger liner.
More examplesFewer examplesShe was the first woman to attempt the transoceanic crossing from Newfoundland to Ireland.This could be evidence of trans-oceanic contact between ancient civilizations in Europe and America.On their transoceanic flights, the birds live mainly on the flesh of dead fish.Many explorers lost their lives in search of this trans-oceanic route.
